name: Plastic inc.
description:
Use the arrow keys to move.
Space to deploy or undeploy your net.
If your net is full you won't catch any plastic. 
You can clear your net with space.
if you press the shop sign the shop opens.
There are five upgrades: height(makes your net longer), width(increases the max value of plastic in your net), speed(makes you go faster) speed when net out(makes you go faster if your net is out, the net slows you down) and the last one icreases the amount of money you get per piece of plastic. 
You can also buy a robot that cleans up the beach and gives you money automaticly.
To exit the shop press the button on the right bottom of the shop.

Have fun!!

There are still a few bugs but I didn't have much time left (;
